鼵鼵鼵

鼵字的基本解释

鼵
tū
古书上指一种与鵌鸟同穴而居的鼠。似家鼠而小，色黄，尾短，尾毛蓬松。亦称“兀鼠”。

鼵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tú］
［《廣韻》陀骨切，入没，定。］
鼠名。

鼵字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼠字部】　鼵； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1529第11
【廣韻】陀骨切【集韻】陁沒切，?音突。【爾雅·釋鳥】鳥鼠同穴，其鳥爲鵌，其鼠爲鼵。【註】鼵如人家鼠而短尾，鵌似鵽而小，黃黑色，穴入地三四尺，鼠在內，鳥在外。今在隴西首陽縣鳥鼠同穴山中。孔氏尙書傳云：共爲雄雌。張氏地理志云：不爲牝牡。鵽字原刻从鳥从叕作。

鼵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鼵字的起名意思

暂无。

Hawk
Basic explanation of words
Hawk
tū
In ancient books, it refers to a kind of rat that lives in the same cave with the bird. It is small like a house mouse, yellow in color, short tail and fluffy tail hair. Also known as "Wood Rat".
Hawk
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tú］
["Guangyun" Tuo bone cut, enter the end, set. ]
Rat name.
Hawk
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Jixia] [Mouse Character Department] 　鼵; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1529 No. 11
[Guang Yun] Tuo bone cut [Ji Yun] No cut, sound sudden. 【Erya·Shuniao】Birds and mice have the same cave, the birds are scorpions, and the mice are scorpions. [Note] The buzzard is like a rat with a short tail, and the buzzard is like a buzzard but small, yellow-black, three or four feet into the ground, the rat is inside, and the bird is outside. Today in the Tongxue Mountain of Birds and Rats in Shouyang County, Longxi Province. The book of Kong's surname goes: There are males and females. Zhang's Geography Zhiyun: Not for Minmu. The character 鵽 was originally engraved from Niao Cong 叕.
